citeinfo.origin: China State Oceanic Administration, First Institute of Oceanography
citeinfo.title: 3-D Baronclinic Current Model

descript.abstract:
The 3-D baroclinic current model mainly focused on the coastal seas of China and adjacent North Pacific. The model is developed based on the Princeton Ocean Model (POM).
[ Reference: PICES Scientific Report No. 18 2001, Proceedings of the PICES/CoML/IPRC Workshop on "Impact of Climate Variability on Observation and Prediction of Ecosystem and Biodiversity Changes in the North Pacific", http://www.pices.int/publications/scientific_reports/Report18/default.aspx. ]
descript.purpose: To better understand China's coastal sea currents.
